com.team3824.akmessing1.scoutingapp.activities

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.team3824.akmessing1.scoutingapp.activities.Server

  • public class Server
extends Activity
    Activity that listens for bluetooth connections, receives data and requests for data, aggregates the data, and logs.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Andrew Messing
